title: What phones work with Google fi? - Quora

response.answer_text: Google Fi phones are designated as “designed for Fi.” The full list of supported devices is below: LG V35 ThinQLG G7 ThinQMoto G7Motorola Moto G6Motorola Moto X4 (Android One)Nexus 5XNexus 6PNexus 6Pixel 3a XLPixel 3aPixel 3Pixel 3 XLPixel 2Pixel 2 XLPixelPixel XL
